title: ЛАПТОП LENOVO LEGION SLIM 5 16AHP9 16" R7-8845HS/32GB DDR5/1TB/RTX 4070 8GB
description:
Лаптоп
Дисплей:16" (40.64cm)
Резолуција:WQXGA (2560x1600), IPS 350nits Anti-glare, 100% sRGB, 165Hz, Dolby® Vision™, G-SYNC®, Free-Sync Premium, Low Blue Light
Процесор:AMD Ryzen™ 7 8845HS (8C / 16T, 3.8 / 5.1GHz, 8MB L2 / 16MB L3)
Графика:NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 8GB GDDR6, Boost Clock 2175MHz, TGP 140W
Внатрешна меморија:32GB DDR5-5600
Мемиорија:1TB SSD M.2 2280 PCIe® 4.0x4 NVMe®
Без оперативен систем
Аудио:High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek® ALC3287 codec
Звучници:Stereo speakers, 2W x2, optimized with Nahimic Audio
Камера:FHD 1080p with E-shutter
Микрофон:2x, Array
Ethernet:100/1000M (RJ-45)
Wi-Fi® 6E, 11ax 2x2 + BT5.3
White Backlit
Порти:
1x USB-A (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), Always On
1x USB-A (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2)
1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with PD 140W and DisplayPort™ 1.4
1x USB-C® (USB 10Gbps / USB 3.2 Gen 2), with DisplayPort™ 1.4
1x HDMI® 2.1, up to 8K/60Hz
1x Headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm)
1x Ethernet (RJ-45)
1x Card reader
1x Power connector
Power Adapter:230W Slim Tip (3-pin)
Батерија:Integrated 80Wh
